snippet: Major donors are preparing to inject $100 million into independent groups that plan to avoid the type of advertising campaigns financed by conservatives.
abstract: George Soros is among the major liberal donors preparing to inject up to $100 million into independent groups to aid Democrats' chances in 2012 elections; instead of going head to head with the conservative super PACs and outside groups that have flooded the presidential and Congressional campaigns with negative advertising, the donors are focusing on grass-roots organizing, voter registration and Democratic turnout.
lead_paragraph: Major donors are preparing to inject $100 million into independent groups that plan to avoid the type of advertising campaigns financed by conservatives.

headline.seo: Liberals Focusing Outside Money on Grass Roots
headline.main: Liberals Steer Outside Money to Grass-Roots Organizing
headline.print_headline: Liberal Donors Will Spend Big On Grass Roots

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
